* Add ipc=host to allow ros comm between containers

* Cleanup args and version

* Update service name to reach_ros

* Add rviz2 as dependency for the demo

* Parameterize the ros distribution for the dockerfile

* Add a ci job for docker

* Updated docker job to run on foxy, humble and jazzy to match other CI jobs

* Call `rosdep update` with EOL distributions argument

---------

Merge pull request #3 from mripperger/development

General Improvements

data.author: mripperger
data.message: Added functionality to specify results directory; changed inputs to launch files to be full path to robot launch file and reach object yaml; fixed bug in reach object mesh extension checker

data.author: mripperger
data.message: Added empty results directory

data.author: mripperger
data.message: Changed the way interactive markers are sized (now = 0.5*optimization_radius). Various other minor changes

data.author: mripperger
data.message: Eliminated mesh sampling parameters; allowed ply and obj files to be loaded as collision objects; renamed several parameters; minor code clean up items

data.author: mripperger
data.message: Replaced sample mesh server with a pcd loader that transforms the saved point cloud; the mesh should be sampled before running the study

data.author: mripperger
data.message: Documentation changes to README and reach_study_object.yaml; added rotation of normals back; minor changes to launch files; added scripts folder for multiple config bash
